mapper.insert: INSERT INTO img_upload_task (upload_id, file_name, file_size, file_hash, chunk_size, total_chunks, uploaded_chunks, uploaded_parts, storage_path, status, expires_at) VALUES (#{uploadId}, #{fileName}, #{fileSize}, #{fileHash}, #{chunkSize}, #{totalChunks}, #{uploadedChunks}, #{uploadedParts}, #{storagePath}, #{status}, #{expiresAt})
mapper.update: UPDATE img_upload_task SET uploaded_chunks = #{uploadedChunks}, uploaded_parts = #{uploadedParts}, status = #{status}, updated_at = datetime('now') WHERE upload_id = #{uploadId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM img_upload_task WHERE status = 'uploading' AND expires_at < #{expireTime}
